segments.text: It's such a shame to see this family moment turning risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so content drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflow is destroying the kitchen slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are innocent in their play, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall from that height on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister waits so eagerly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems like a safe haven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will cost them so much to fix.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, and that makes it even sadder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are just sitting there, causing trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the mom when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful scene hides so much potential heartbreak.
segments.speaker: PAR
